text: Baluna, ‘allah‌ chara amara ki emana kichuke dakaba, ya amadera kono upakara kimba apakara karate'o pare na? Ara allah‌ amaderake hidayata deyara para amaderake ki agera abasthaya phirano habe [1] se byaktira mata, yake sayatana yamine emana saktabhabe peye baseche ye se disehara? Tara rayeche kichu (imanadara) sahacara, tara take hidayatera prati ahabana kare bale, ‘amadera kache asa?’ [2] Baluna, ‘allaha hidayata'i sathika hidayata ebam amara adista hayechi srstikulera raba-era kache atnasamarpana karate[3].’
